#Packages

library(RSQLite)

#Settings
For testing library builds, settings in the function
```{r}
#library name
Library = "DBstuff/yeast_consensus.sptxt"
FragmentationMode = "CID"
MassAnalyzer = "IT"
CollisionEnergy = "35"
Source = "SpectraST"
TMTPro = TRUE
```



#Read .msp and build tables 
Function to build and manipulate database files for use with RTLS 
```{r}

source("lib\\msp2db.R")

MSPtoDB("DBstuff/yeast_consensus.sptxt", FragmentationMode, MassAnalyzer, CollisionEnergy, TMTPro, "RTLS Databases/YeastTesting54.db", Source)

```
